programme.desc: Returning home after a long absence, a romance novelist reconnects with her children as they start to find their own paths to love.

programme.desc: Sparks fly between a young woman and her ex-boyfriend when they work together to save her family's general store.

programme.title: Just One Kiss
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a professor and a lounge singer after their respective mothers hatch a scheme to set them up.

programme.title: When Love Springs
programme.desc: When Rory arrives at a bed-and-breakfast for her parents' vow renewal, she runs into the ex who broke her heart. Panicked, she pretends the bed-and-breakfast owner is her new boyfriend.

programme.desc: When after school programs see their funding cut, teachers Josh and Ella turn to fundraising before banding together in search of a larger donation, falling hard along the way.
